subject: Technology
title: The Switch: Console Meets Portable
description: A fast breakdown of The Switch: Console Meets Portable for builders.

hook.text: For decades, you had a home console and a portable one. Nintendo asked: why not both?

buildup.text: The Switch launched in 2017 as a tablet that docks to your TV and detaches for handheld play.

discovery.text: Playing a full console game on the bus, then finishing it on the couch, felt like magic.

twist.text: It was far less powerful than PlayStation or Xbox. Again, Nintendo chose innovation over raw specs.

climax.text: The Switch has sold over 140 million units, becoming one of the best-selling consoles in history.

punchline.text: Nintendo keeps winning by changing what a console can be.

quiz.question: What makes the Nintendo Switch unique?
options: It works as both a home console and a portable device
